name: CottageCoreCreator
description:
Cottage core creator is intended for VR users and aims to give the player a relaxing experience, growing their own little world.

The project wasnt finished on time, since it's a buggy mess.

It will shortly be fixed, if people still want to play it :)

ASSETS USED:

Chalkboard

Sunflower Seed

Gaxebo

and Toon Fantasy Nature

As well as some royalty-free music from FreeSound
